entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
